channel.title: Annoying invisible, bullet-proof wall at hydroelectric dam
channel.description:
Hi! There is some bullet proof wall around a small rock. I can't shoot next to the rock, but the soldiers can shoot me easily. I think it's a bit unfair :slight_smile: (Difficulty: normal)
Picture:
[url]https://shared.muportal.hu/bms-crash/bm_c2a5a0002.jpg[/url]
